item.title: SapientNitro's game changer
item.description: Recognition During the early stages of my career, after wining various awards like rookie of the year award in 2008 for best trainee, I was later recognized as SapientNitroâ€™s (now Publicis Sapient) Game Changer in 2014 for my outstanding contributions.
